mapper.select: select f.postNo, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.regDate, f.viewCount, f.sameThinking, f.boardNo, f.imageFileName, (select count(*) from reply where postNo = f.postNo) as replyCount from freeBoard f, members m where f.writer = m.nick and f.boardNo = #{boardNo} order by f.postNo desc

select f.postNo, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.regDate, f.viewCount, f.sameThinking, f.boardNo, f.imageFileName, (select count(*) from reply where postNo = f.postNo) as replyCount, b.boardName from freeBoard f, members m, boardInCategory b where f.writer = m.nick and f.boardNo = b.boardNo and m.memberNo = #{memberNo} order by f.postNo desc
select count(*) from freeBoard where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into freeBoard(boardNo, title, content, writer, regDate, imageFileName) values(#{boardNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, Now(), #{imageFileName})
mapper.select: select postNo, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCount, sameThinking, boardNo, imageFileName, (select count(*) from reply where postNo = f.postNo) as replyCount from freeBoard f where postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.update: update freeBoard set sameThinking = sameThinking + 1 where postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.select: select boardName from boardInCategory where boardNo=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update freeBoard set viewCount = viewCount + 1 where postNo = #{postNo}
